mapper.select: select copy.book_seq, info.*, copy.book_like, copy.book_dlike, copy.book_star, copy.book_star_cnt from book_info info join book_copy copy on info.book_isbn = copy.book_isbn;
select book_category from book_info group by book_category order by book_category asc

select copy.book_seq, info.book_isbn, info.book_title, info.book_author, info.book_published_date, info.book_publisher, info.book_content, info.book_category, info.book_img, copy.book_like, copy.book_dlike, copy.book_star, copy.book_star_cnt from book_info info join book_copy copy on info.book_isbn = copy.book_isbn where copy.book_seq = #{bookSeq}

select copy.book_seq, info.book_isbn, info.book_title, info.book_author, info.book_published_date, info.book_publisher, info.book_content, info.book_category, info.book_img, copy.book_like, copy.book_dlike, copy.book_star, copy.book_star_cnt from book_info info join book_copy copy on info.book_isbn = copy.book_isbn where info.book_isbn = #{bookIsbn}
mapper.insert: insert into book_info(book_isbn, book_title, book_author, book_published_date, book_publisher, book_content, book_category, book_img) values(#{bookIsbn}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublishDate}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookContent}, #{bookCategory}, #{bookImg})
mapper.update: update book_info set book_title = #{bookTitle}, book_author = #{bookAuthor}, book_published_date = #{bookPublishDate}, book_publisher = #{bookPublisher}, book_content = #{bookContent}, book_category = #{bookCategory}, book_img = #{bookImg} where book_isbn = (select book_isbn from book_copy where book_seq = #{bookSeq})
update book_copy set book_star = #{bookStar}, book_star_cnt = book_star_cnt+1 where book_seq = #{bookSeq}
